ai-iti72:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti72:2.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three elements of escape.
ai-iti72:2.3_0: Renunciation is the escape from sensual pleasures. Formlessness is the escape from form. Cessation is the escape from whatever is created, conditioned, and dependently originated.
ai-iti72:2.4_0: These are the three elements of escape.”
ai-iti72:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti72:4.2_0: and when freed in regards to that,
ai-iti72:4.3_0: that peaceful sage, with perfect insight,
ai-iti72:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
